Pre-Game Insights: Colt Keith is aiming for a more productive showing after a hitless performance in his last game.
The Detroit Tigers will face the Cleveland Guardians in Game 1 of the ALDS on October 5, 2024.
Tanner Bibee will start for the Cleveland Guardians.
Keith has a career record of 4-for-9 with a triple against Tanner Bibee.
Keith has reached base with a hit 87 times this season in 150 games played, including multiple hits in 23.3% of them.
Keith has driven in a run in 40 of 150 games this season, with multiple RBI in 14 of them.
